description.title: Web site development
description: Experienced business manager who understands how to align digital content with an organization's strategy.

bio:
My passion is to help others align their digital assets to create on-going “win-win” solutions. To develop, nurture and grow digital assets over time that continually meet customer needs.

I am considered a creative suit with a passion for change. Not only do I help people see the change that’s coming, I help them seize the day.

Tony Robbins is quoted as saying – “By changing nothing, nothing changes.” 

Digitally, the future is all about change – how we embrace it and how we introduce it to our organizations and customers so that both are satisfied. 

What I love about the web is that it is ever changing. Technology changes. Our customers change the way they use it. Or both. While all this change is going on, our businesses can’t help but be changed as well.

And not all change is seismic. Sometimes it’s incremental; sometimes it’s just a little change that’s needed to delight a customer. Yet because it’s small, sometimes we forget, or we let it go to next time. But there is no next time.

Managing this type of change is not easy. It requires discipline, patience and persistence. But once you start that journey, it is a heck of a ride.

As a digital consultant, I work with my clients to understand their digital environment, their customers’ needs in that environment and a way to continually align both with the purpose of the organization in an ever changing digital world. 

If you are interested in starting that journey, feel free to connect and I can help you take the first step


Specialties: 
B2B | Digital Integration | Web Development | Business Analysis and Requirements | Cross Functional Teams | User Experience | Design Management | Process Improvement | Web Analytics | User Acceptance Testing | Profiling and Personalization | Internal and External Communication | Corporate Marketing and PR | Product Management | Distribution

bio:
I was born and raised in Taipei, Taiwan, I move to Canada before my high school career started and obtain my permanent residency in Canada after graduated from Queen's University (Kingston, Ontario). I work as HR assistant then eventually take an interest in 3d modeling.

I then went to further my 3d education at Herzing College (Toronto, Ontario) then at 3d sense Media School (Singapore, Singapore)
I put in, on average, 4 to 5 hours every working day (could be lengthen if condition requires), I can be reached via my email and skype.

bio: Write Solutions provides premium content and design development, along with brand advisory services to a host of business clients - domestic and international. We have many years of experience doing copy and design for clients, across business verticals. Besides website content, design and development, we also develop corporate brochures, product catalogs, video scripts, industry white papers, ad copies (print, TV, digital), and ghostwrite/edit books and blog posts for celebrity clients on monthly retainership engagement.

We believe good content is good strategy. The way to move forward in the knowledge economy is through WORDS. That's where we come into the picture. We make on time, within budget deliveries. Our work terms are fairly simple and straightforward, once we sign on the dotted line, we make sure that we deliver on time and to the client's full satisfaction.

abstrac: With Expertise of Large Corporate and Agility of Small enterprises, we can be your perfect technology partners. Work with us and experience the difference...
bio:
A 4 years old IT organization founded by IT veterans with 20+ years experience working with large marquee Fortune 500 clients form US/UK/Australia/EU customers. MindChipps has development center in India.

Application and Product Development Organization with Focus on .Net technology.

Team with excellent understanding of SEI CMM, Agile, Six Sigma, BS7799

Service Description

A) Web Application Consulting– MindChipps team can help you to establish your projects functional specification as well as Technical/Design Specification. It includes

Functional Specification:
1) Creating User Experience Elements
2) Identify Critical Functional Requirements
3) Identify Non-functional Requirements
4) Wireframes / Layouts
5) Validations and Rules
6) Email & Alert Templates

Technical / Design Specification:
1) Technical Platform Selection from the Alternatives identified
2) Suitable Design Patterns and Architecture
3) Logical / Physical Database Design
4) Entities, Classes and Interfaces
5) Coding Guidelines
6) Master Pages & Themes

B) .Net Application Development– MindChipps team can help you to develop Simple and Effective .Net Solutions for your complex Business Requirements.

1) Strong Design & Architecture Team with expertise in various Design Patterns, architectures
2) In-house Team - Well Trained & Experienced on various .Net Development Tools and Technologies
3) Experience of developing applications using MVC framework
4) Expertize in various development methodologies including Agile, Iterative, Water fall
5) Responsive UI and Focus on Usability

C) Application Modernization – MindChipps team can help you to modernize/ migrate existing applications to Simple and Effective .Net Applications.

1) Team with expertise in Application Modernization / Migration
2) In-depth understanding of legacy applications developed using Power Builder, VB, COM, Access, Excel, etc.
3) Expertise in Selecting right strategy and target platform for Migration

We are flexible on work terms in general but follow below guidelines

1. Work hours - India time with 4 hours overlap with most countries
2. We work on fixed price as well as Time & Material Projects
3. Minimum Hourly Rate - USD 14/Hour
